message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $1200000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal, and I believe you'll be thrilled with the value this product will bring to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the current market conditions.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to offer you a compromise at $1150000. This is still a great deal, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1150000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1125000. This is a fair price that I'm willing to pay for the product, and I believe it's a good middle ground.
